statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 21 \\ 15 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -35 \\ -25 \\ -5 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
